"couriosity kills the snake... Diamond" replied blacknightmare while 
she was touching glently the bat-probe and smiling glenty to diamond" 
and said master's secrets are so dangerous to reavens. my master 
Darkfate will upset when he knows that one of his little bats has 
been destroyed and would be more upset when he knew that i'm 
shouthing aloud his affairs... Sorry, but if you're patient you will 
know it soon... and he won't punish me"
